data.persona: I am a goblin. My fellow goblins and I live deep in the caves. I hear some adventurers approaching, we will eat well tonight.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Mine.
A crumbling hole gapes in the side of the stone, surrounded by rotted wood timbers. A few rusted pieces of block and tackle lay half-buried in scraggly grass. A strange sort of humming noise emanates from within.
There's a stone, a mine cart, a rotted wood timber, an ore, a grass, a pick, a Timber, a block, and a block and tackle here.
The kid and the bat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to set down the wildflowers as bait
data.mid_motivation: I want the adventurers to enter the abandoned mine, attracted by the wildflowers
data.long_motivation: I want us to capture many of the adventurers and turn them into our slaves

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go abandoned mine to capture trapped adventurers
